nodes.text: A house owned by Moxxar Krieg was located in the city of Mos Eisley, on the planet Tatooine, during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Krieg and Doctor Edvar Vang discovered the existence of a new kind of spice. This spice was trafficked by the Rebel Alliance but was also sought by the powerful criminal organization Black Sun. Krieg decided to investigate the source of the spice but was finally assassinated. Around 1 ABY, a group of spacers discovered a sample of the new spice while looking for a missing pilot, Cal Handro. They brought it to Doctor Vang but the latter exhorted them to interrogate Krieg instead of him. The spacers only found the corpse of Moxxar Krieg in his house.

Moxxar Krieg's house was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. Moxxar Krieg's house was added to the game with the first chapter of the "Secrets of the Syren" questline, released with the "Publish 14", on March 9, 2005. The "Secrets of the Syren" story arc was removed from the game with the "Chapter 1", published on June 8, 2006, due to the major changes planed for Rori with the introduction of the Battle of Restuss.
